alert.note: Alert for Clark; Codington; Hamlin (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 30 at 12:29PM MDT until May 30 at 12:45PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN HAMLIN...EAST CENTRAL CLARK AND SOUTHWESTERN CODINGTON COUNTIES... At 128 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Tinkertown, or 12 miles southwest of Watertown, moving north at 45 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. At 125 PM CDT, quarter size hail was reported in Hazel. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Long Lake. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Aberdeen.
